text: Si Men waɗuno nde janngeteende e haala ajami, ɓe wi'ayno: "Ko haɗno Aayeeje mayre ɗen fensitee? E nde wonay e haala ajami, [Nulaaɗo] on wona aarabuujo?" Maaku: "Kayre wonannde gomɗimɓe ɓen, ko nde peewal e cellal". Ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen kan, noto hino e noppi maɓɓe ɗin, kayre ko nde niɓe e dow maɓɓe; ɓen hino noddiree e nokku woɗɗuɗo
